name: staple_removers
description: Flat back made out of a light cardboard with a mostly light green front side. The two staplers are packaged on top of one another with a ½ stapler overhang. The staplers are laid vertically and take up about ½ of the package. The overhang created by placing the stapler on top of one another creates multiple irregular surfaces. Clear plastic is used in packing the staplers.
